STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions                                               OWASP MASVS: MSTG-STORAGE-14
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_write_app_dir in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_write_app_dir in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

ISSUE: App can read/write to External Storage. Any App can read data written to External Storage.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions                        OWASP Top 10: M2: Insecure Data Storage                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-STORAGE-2
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_read_write_external in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_read_write_external in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

ISSUE: Insecure WebView Implementation. Execution of user controlled code in WebView is a critical Security Hole.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-749: Exposed Dangerous Method or Function                        OWASP Top 10: M1: Improper Platform Usage                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-PLATFORM-7
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_webview in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_webview in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

ISSUE: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values                        OWASP Top 10: M5: Insufficient Cryptography                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-CRYPTO-6
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_insecure_random in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_insecure_random in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

ISSUE: App creates temp file. Sensitive information should never be written into a temp file.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-276: Incorrect Default Permissions                        OWASP Top 10: M2: Insecure Data Storage                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-STORAGE-2
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_temp_file in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_temp_file in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-919: Weaknesses in Mobile Applications                        OWASP Top 10: M1: Improper Platform Usage                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-RESILIENCE-2
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_webview_debug in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_webview_debug in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

ISSUE: MD5 is a weak hash known to have hash collisions.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm                        OWASP Top 10: M5: Insufficient Cryptography                        OWASP MASVS: MSTG-CRYPTO-4
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_md5 in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_md5 in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files

ISSUE: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
STANDARDS: CWE: CWE-89: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')                        OWASP Top 10: M7: Client Code Quality
OPTIONS: Suppress the rule android_sql_raw_query in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote                         Suppress the rule android_sql_raw_query in com.subaru.telematics.app.remote only from these files
